programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures flee from an evil wizard, only to end up magically transported to modern-day New York. They search for a way to get back to their own village while evading their enemy, who has followed them to the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, with Neil Patrick Harris, Hank Azaria and Jayma Mays, plus voices of Jonathan Winters and Katy Perry.(n)

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures and their human friends go on a rescue mission to Paris. Their old foe Gargamel the evil wizard has created mischievous smurfs of his own and kidnapped Smurfette to learn the secret of her magic. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Hank Azaria and Neil Patrick Harris, with the voices of Katy Perry and Christina Ricci.(n)

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: A mysterious map sends Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty on a quest into the Forbidden Forest. Animated adventure, with the voices of Demi Lovato and Julia Roberts.(n)

programme.title: The Sandlot
programme.desc: A gang of youngsters spends a summer in the 1960s playing baseball, while trying to avoid a large and extremely fierce dog. Family comedy, starring Tom Guiry, Karen Allen, Chauncey Leopardi and Denis Leary.(n)

programme.title: Hop
programme.desc: The Easter bunny's son is about to take over the chocolate-delivering business, but rejects his responsibilities and heads for Hollywood to seek fame and fortune as a drummer. He makes life difficult for the directionless slacker who takes him in, but they must work together to avert a crisis on Easter island. Part-animated comedy, starring James Marsden, with the voice of Russell Brand.(n)

programme.title: Dog Eat Dog
programme.desc: A crew of former prisoners are hired by a Cleveland crime syndicate to kidnap the baby of a rival mobster. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Willem Dafoe and Christopher Matthew Cook.

programme.title: Drone
programme.desc: A drone pilot who's spent his career conducting covert operations from the comfort of his own home is finally forced to confront his actions. Thriller, starring Sean Bean, Patrick Sabongui and Mary McCormack.

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.

programme.title: Let Me Make You a Martyr
programme.desc: Two siblings hatch a plan to take out their father, only for him to put a hitman on their tail. Revenge drama, starring Mark Boone Junior, Marilyn Manson and Sam Quartin.

programme.title: Mine
programme.desc: Following a failed assassination attempt, a soldier is stranded in the desert where he must survive the elements and stay sane enough to survive. Thriller, starring Armie Hammer, Annabelle Wallis and Tom Cullen.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patient's fractured mind as a 24th character attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalan's thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley.

programme.title: Grey Lady
programme.desc: A Boston police officer goes to Nantucket to investigate the murder of his partner, but finds more than he bargained for. Thriller, starring Eric Dane, Natalie Zea and Amy Madigan.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowe's remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A driverless train carrying a deadly cargo of toxic chemicals goes out of control. A veteran train operator and his rookie colleague set off in pursuit in their own locomotive, intending to bring it to a halt before it crashes and causes a major disaster. Action thriller, the final film from director Tony Scott, starring Denzel Washington, Chris Pine and Rosario Dawson.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 123
programme.desc: Criminals hijack a crowded New York subway train and threaten to start shooting the passengers unless a $10million ransom is paid in one hour. However, the transport supervisor they issue their demands to begins to suspect the plot is part of an even grander scheme. Tony Scott's thriller remake, with Denzel Washington and John Travolta.

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: Ten strangers take shelter from a storm in a remote hotel, but start to suspect their being together at the same place and time is more than just a coincidence. Before long a mysterious figure begins to murder them off one by one - leaving the guests to work out which of them is the killer, or if someone else is in the hotel. Murder mystery, starring John Cusack, Ray Liotta, Amanda Peet and Alfred Molina.

programme.title: Rise Of The Footsoldier 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster Pat Tate rises through the ranks of Essex's criminal underworld. Prequel, starring Craig Fairbrass, Terry Stone and Roland Manookian.

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: A CIA agent stationed in South Africa is sent to question a rogue operative, who has been arrested years after betraying the agency, only to be attacked by mercenaries hired to capture the fugitive. As they flee for their lives, the interrogator has to contend with not only the enemies hunting them, but also the mind games of his prisoner. Thriller, with Denzel Washington and Ryan Reynolds.(n)

programme.title: Southern Fury
programme.desc: When his brother falls foul of a ruthless mobster, a straight-laced man calls on his old friend and cop to help out. Crime thriller, starring Adrian Grenier, John Cusack and Nicolas Cage.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: Breakdown
programme.desc: A founding member of a secret society of assassins struggles to cope, as memories of his past misdeeds cause panic attacks and his family starts to fall apart. When he breaks down during the torture of a captive, his employers fear he is no longer reliable - and threaten the lives of his wife and daughter. Action thriller, starring Craig Fairbrass and James Cosmo.(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate risk-management consultant decides whether or not to destroy an artificially created humanoid. Sci-fi thriller, starring Kate Mara, Anya Taylor-Joy and Rose Leslie.(n)

programme.title: Live by Night
programme.desc: A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan. Crime drama, directed by and starring Ben Affleck, with Elle Fanning, Remo Girone and Brendan Gleeson.(n)

programme.title: I Am Not A Serial Killer
programme.desc: A weird teen shows homicidal tendencies, making him the perfect youth to find a real murderer. Supernatural thriller, starring Max Records, Christopher Lloyd and Laura Fraser.(n)

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: The presidential election is approaching, but it remains to be seen whether anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan can survive the night. Action horror, with Frank Grillo, Mykelti Williamson and Elizabeth Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: The Adjustment Bureau
programme.desc: A politician is attracted to a dancer he meets at a pivotal moment in his life, but finds his every effort to get to know her is thwarted by a group of mysterious men. He realises these shadowy figures are manipulating him and moving him toward a predetermined fate, which he resolves to fight. Sci-fi thriller, starring Matt Damon and Emily Blunt.(n)

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con battles to protect his estranged daughter from the cronies of her cartel member ex. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Erin Moriarty and Diego Luna.(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: Thieves attempt a major heist against the US Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its mint facilities. Action thriller, starring Toby Kebbell, Maggie Grace and Ryan Kwanten.(n)

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: An American cargo ship sets a dangerous course around the coast of Somalia, while inland, four men are pressed into service as pirates by the local warlords. The captain is taken hostage when the raiding party hijacks the vessel, resulting in a tense five-day crisis. Fact-based thriller, starring Tom Hanks and Barkhad Abdi.(n)

programme.title: B&B
programme.desc: A gay couple plan for a weekend of mischief, winding up the Christian owner of a remote Christian B&B. Events take a sinister turn when another guest arrives, who they think might have something more deadly in mind. Thriller, starring Tom Bateman, Sean Teale and Paul McGann.(n)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper.(n)

programme.title: Roxxy
programme.desc: Romance blooms between a small-town loner and a rebellious punk rocker, but can the pair escape their troubled pasts? Drama, starring Emile Hirsch, Zoe Kravitz and Zoey Deutch.(n)

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.(n)

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically engineered assassin, who exists at the beck and call of a mysterious organisation, fails in his latest mission, and becomes a target himself, as security forces worldwide become aware of his existence and a rival agent is assigned to tie up loose ends. Action thriller, starring Timothy Olyphant, Dougray Scott and Olga Kurylenko.(n)

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the Da Vinci Code expert suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan.(n)

programme.title: Armored
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck new recruit at an armoured truck company agrees to join his colleagues in a heist on one of their own vehicles, on the condition that no one gets hurt. However, when the plan starts to unravel and a witness is murdered, the thieves begin to turn on one another. Crime thriller, starring Matt Dillon, Columbus Short, Jean Reno and Laurence Fishburne.(n)

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: A daring Canadian intelligence officer falls for a beautiful French resistance fighter during the Second World War. When they reunite in London, their relationship is tested by the pressures of conflict. Epic Robert Zemeckis thriller, starring Brad Pitt, Marion Cotillard and Jared Harris.(n)

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: MI6 operative Lorraine Broughton is sent to Berlin before the fall of the wall to investigate the murder of a fellow spy and recover a missing list of double agents. Thriller, starring Charlize Theron, James McAvoy and John Goodman.(n)

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor.(n)

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the Da Vinci Code expert suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan.(n)

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A maverick detective vows to catch a racist criminal suspected of murdering an innocent black man. However, the only witness is reluctant to talk, and the killer comes from a very wealthy family, prompting the tough-talking cop to quit the force and bring in the culprit on his own terms. Remake of the blaxploitation thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson, Christian Bale and Toni Collette.(n)

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: MI6 operative Lorraine Broughton is sent to Berlin before the fall of the wall to investigate the murder of a fellow spy and recover a missing list of double agents. Thriller, starring Charlize Theron, James McAvoy and John Goodman.(n)

programme.title: 100 Bloody Acres
programme.desc: Two brothers' organic fertiliser business is booming thanks to their product's extra-special ingredient of human blood, with their next supply arriving in the form of three people whose vehicle has broken down while they were on their way to a music festival. Australian comedy horror, starring Angus Sampson, Damon Herriman and Anna McGahan.

programme.title: Robots
programme.desc: Rodney the robot heads for the city, hoping to find an investor for his latest invention. Instead, he winds up clashing with an evil business mogul intent on stopping a manufacturer from making spare parts needed for ageing robots - so Rodney teams up with assorted rusty rejects to put the matter right. Animated adventure, with the voices of Ewan McGregor, Halle Berry, Robin Williams, Greg Kinnear and Amanda Bynes.

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: An ordinary teenager is recruited by a mystical martial arts master for a vitally important quest. He must find seven magical spheres before they fall into the hands of an evil warlord, who intends to use their power to let him take over the world. Fantasy adventure based on the Japanese cartoon series, starring Justin Chatwin, Chow Yun-Fat and James Marsters.

programme.title: Princess Mononoke
programme.desc: A young man develops a strange infection after an encounter with a demonic creature. As he sets out in search of a cure, he ends up trying to avert a war between the humans of a mining community and the spirits of the natural world, including a mysterious girl who was raised by wolves. Hayao Miyazaki's animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Billy Crudup, Claire Danes and Gillian Anderson.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: A streetwise cop is enlisted by a top-secret government force dedicated to policing alien visitors to Earth, teaming up with a veteran agent just as a body-swapping extraterrestrial giant insect begins a reign of terror throughout New York City. Sci-fi comedy, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Linda Fiorentino, Rip Torn and Vincent D'Onofrio.

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A gifted young scientist joins a secret project researching inter-dimensional travel, and return from a journey to another world granted superhuman powers. Their abilities make them the only hope for Earth's survival when a colleague who was lost on their expedition returns to wreak vengeance. Superhero adventure, starring Miles Teller, Michael B Jordan, Kate Mara and Jamie Bell.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A manned mission to Mars is abruptly abandoned, with one crew member left for dead. However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last a month. Ridley Scott's sci-fi drama based on the novel by Andy Weir, starring Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig and Chiwetel Ejiofor.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A teenager recovering from the suicide of a friend persuades a group of her classmates to join her in attempting to make contact with the dead girl's spirit. They discover that she was driven to her death by dangerous supernatural forces, which they have unwittingly unleashed to prey on them. Horror, starring Olivia Cooke and Ana Coto.

programme.title: Better Things
programme.desc: The residents of a small Cotswolds town lead troubled lives, including a recently hospitalised woman trying to connect with her reclusive sister, a couple whose marriage is falling apart and a bereaved man turning to drugs to cope with his loss. Drama, starring Patricia Loveland, Rachel McIntyre and Liam McIlfatrick.(n)

programme.title: Pom Poko
programme.desc: Magical creatures with the ability to change shape find their food supplies are running low, leading to squabbles and fights. However, they soon realise they must join forces to combat the real enemy - the seemingly unstoppable march of progress, which threatens to turn their forest home into an urban development. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jonathan Taylor Thomas and Tress MacNeille.(n)

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Children's adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci.(n)

programme.title: We Bought a Zoo
programme.desc: A father-of-two struggling to cope with the death of his wife is in need of a fresh start, so buys a house with a dilapidated zoo on the grounds. With the help of the keepers, he works to restore the attraction to its former glory, while also trying to reconnect with his troubled teenage son. Fact-based comedy drama, starring Matt Damon, Scarlett Johansson and Thomas Haden Church.(n)

programme.title: Iron Man 2
programme.desc: Tycoon-turned-superhero Tony Stark confronts a fearsome new foe in a Russian scientist using his own deadly hi-tech weapons to seek revenge. He also faces a struggle to keep his secrets out of the hands of both the government and an amoral rival, and discovers the armour he developed to fight evil is slowly killing him. Action adventure sequel, with Robert Downey Jr, Mickey Rourke and Don Cheadle.(n)

programme.title: Sicario
programme.desc: An FBI agent is recruited to join an elite government task force based on the border between the US and Mexico, charged with preventing drugs being smuggled into the country. The team is sent on a secret mission, and the new recruit is forced to question everything she believes in order to survive. Crime drama, starring Emily Blunt, Josh Brolin and Benicio Del Toro.(n)

programme.title: Extraterrestrial
programme.desc: Five college friends spending a weekend in a remote cabin fear for their lives when they accidentally blunder onto a conspiracy theorist's land. The situation grows far more terrifying when a UFO crash lands nearby, and the surviving occupant comes looking for human prey. Sci-fi horror, starring Brittany Allen and Freddie Stroma.(n)

programme.title: Priest
programme.desc: In the future, the world has been devastated by a war between humans and vampires, leaving an enclave of survivors living under the domination of a religious hierarchy. A war veteran-turned-priest breaks his vows and sets off in search of his niece, who has been kidnapped by undead villains. Fantasy action thriller, with Paul Bettany, Karl Urban and Maggie Q.(n)

programme.title: Cheaper By the Dozen 2
programme.desc: Tom and Kate Baker and their 12 children are enjoying a summer holiday together at their lakeside cabin before the last of the kids flies the nest. All is well until Tom realises arch-rival Jimmy Murtaugh and his family are staying nearby, and even though the youngsters are having fun, the fathers succumb to increasingly frequent displays of one-upmanship. Comedy sequel, with Steve Martin, Eugene Levy, Bonnie Hunt and Hilary Duff.(n)

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: A romantic novelist goes in search of her kidnapped sister in the steamy jungles of South America, only to become the target of a villainous general who demands as a ransom the valuable treasure map in her possession. Help is at hand in the form of a craggy daredevil fortune hunter, who has his eye on a share of the profits. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner and Danny DeVito.(n)

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: A party of explorers studying the sunken remains of the famous liner meets an elderly woman who was a passenger on the ill-fated maiden voyage. She recounts how she boarded the ship while on the brink of being forced into marriage by her family, and was stopped from killing herself by a penniless artist. She fell in love with her saviour, but the disaster on the horizon meant their time together was doomed to be short. James Cameron's Oscar-winning romantic drama, starring Kate Winslet, Leonardo DiCaprio, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates and Bill Paxton.(n)

programme.title: Last Vegas
programme.desc: A sixtysomething confirmed bachelor finally decides to settle down with his much younger girlfriend. He and three friends decide to mark the occasion by reliving their wild youth with a trip to Las Vegas - but they find that both the city and each other have changed since their glory days. Comedy, starring Michael Douglas, Robert De Niro, Morgan Freeman and Kevin Kline.(n)

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: A retired CIA agent survives an assassination attempt and realises something in his past has made him a target. He sets out to reunite the members of his old hit squad to find out who is trying to kill them and why, but in the process, uncovers dangerous secrets. Action thriller, with Bruce Willis, Morgan Freeman, John Malkovich and Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: A Romanian knight fights to defend his homeland against Turkish invaders. Faced with overwhelming odds, he enters into a dangerous bargain to gain supernatural powers so he can drive off his enemies - but the deal could cost him his humanity as he transforms into a terrifying monster. Fantasy adventure, starring Luke Evans, Dominic Cooper and Charles Dance.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The family offers the new minister a place to stay, and Elizabeth falls in love with him. Erin offers to help the Baldwin sisters write their memoirs.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben hatches a money-making scheme his father does not approve of, while Yancy trains to become a barber.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A new arrival in town encourages the farmers to invest in a new form of corn. However, when he has an accident and does not come home, they think they have been cheated.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A snowstorm strikes as the Ingalls make their way home after a trip to Mankato, and they struggle to survive in a remote mountain cabin with little food.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd meets an old medical school friend on leave from a rural African hospital, but he soon shows symptoms of the deadly Ebola virus, forcing the health department to clamp a quarantine around Syd's clinic and the Hansen household where a children's party is in full swing. Melina Kanakaredes stars.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: The Hansens have a surprise visit from an ageing member of the family, who has a potentially lucrative proposition.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Once in a Lifetime
programme.desc: An author reflects on her literary career while recovering from a road accident, but cannot help dwelling on the loss of her husband and baby - and further tragedy only serves to compound her sorrow. Drama, starring Lindsay Wagner, Barry Bostwick and Amy Aquino.

programme.title: The Edge of the Garden
programme.desc: A newly single man moves into an abandoned house in the country, where he starts to communicate with a woman who lived there 50 years ago and died in mysterious circumstances. Drama, starring Rob Estes.

programme.title: She Drives Me Crazy
programme.desc: A woman whose husband has recently died is invited on a road trip by her wilder estranged sister. The widow soon learns her younger sibling has a very important reason for taking this journey, which changes both their lives for ever. Drama, starring Krista Bridges and Melinda Clarke.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Emily thinks her lost love has come back to her, only to discover it is his son, who is more interested in Erin. Guest starring Jonathan Frakes (Star Trek: The Next Generation).

programme.title: Ironside
programme.sub-title: Downhill All the Way - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. A boy witnesses the murder of a political aide just before an election. Later, there is a leak inside the police department, and the Chief quits under the strain of protecting a witness. Raymond Burr stars.

programme.title: Voices
programme.desc: Following a near-death experience, a woman is terrified to realise she is able to see and speak with the dead. Returning home, she is approached by the angry ghost of a dead woman, who accuses her mysterious and handsome new neighbour of her own brutal murder. Drama, starring Amy Acker, Bronwen Booth and Steve Cumyn.

programme.title: Sony Movie News
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, celebrity gossip and Hollywood rumours.

programme.title: Voices
programme.desc: Following a near-death experience, a woman is terrified to realise she is able to see and speak with the dead. Returning home, she is approached by the angry ghost of a dead woman, who accuses her mysterious and handsome new neighbour of her own brutal murder. Drama, starring Amy Acker, Bronwen Booth and Steve Cumyn.

programme.title: Flirting with Danger
programme.desc: When a man's best friend unexpectedly has a fatal heart attack, he begins to suspect foul play - and when more men in seemingly good health start to die, he joins forces with a police officer in a race against time to get to the bottom of the mystery. Thriller, starring James Thomas, Victoria Sanchez and Charisma Carpenter.

programme.title: Sony Movie News
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, celebrity gossip and Hollywood rumours.

programme.title: Flirting with Danger
programme.desc: When a man's best friend unexpectedly has a fatal heart attack, he begins to suspect foul play - and when more men in seemingly good health start to die, he joins forces with a police officer in a race against time to get to the bottom of the mystery. Thriller, starring James Thomas, Victoria Sanchez and Charisma Carpenter.

programme.title: Joan of Arc
programme.desc: The first of a two-part drama. A young French girl experiences religious visions, convincing her she has been sent by God to unite her countrymen under the rule of King Charles. In the heat of battle, however, she is captured, and sold to the English enemy. Historical drama, starring Leelee Sobieski, Jacqueline Bissett, Powers Boothe, Olympia Dukakis, Shirley MacLaine and Peter O'Toole.

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: A bigoted misanthropic writer, who treats everyone he meets with contempt, is forced to look after a gay neighbour's dog, and develops an empathy with another creature for the first time in years. Sensing a need for human company, he pursues an unlikely romance with a waitress, who is the only person willing to put up with his rudeness. Romantic comedy drama, with Jack Nicholson, Helen Hunt, Cuba Gooding Jr and Greg Kinnear.

programme.title: Sony Movie News
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, celebrity gossip and Hollywood rumours.

Romantic comedy drama, with Jack Nicholson, Helen Hunt, Cuba Gooding Jr and Greg Kinnear.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben hatches a money-making scheme his father does not approve of, while Yancy trains to become a barber.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jason wrestles with the morality of war as he decides whether to enlist in the army, while Jim Bob is desperate to join up despite being too young.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The family takes in an old friend of John Boy's who has been serving in the war, but is now in a wheelchair as a result of his injuries.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Johnny Johnson drops out of school hoping to see the world, but his first adventure only gets him into trouble.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The locals celebrate the founding of Walnut Grove, but the contests held to mark the occasion bring out a competitive streak in the Ingalls and Oleson families.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd fights the system to save a baby boy whose life is being jeopardised by the intricacies of interdepartmental procedure. Drama, starring Melinda Kanakaredes and Mike Farrell.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd campaigns for the production of a wonder drug capable of curing a deadly childhood disease, while Robbie is distressed to discover his girlfriend is attempting a reconciliation with her ex-husband. Melinda Kanakaredes stars.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Palomino
programme.desc: A photographer, struggling to overcome the break-up of her marriage by going to live on a friend's California ranch, where her riding skills impress the ranch hands - one of whom she embarks on a passionate affair with. However, her life takes a turn for the worse when her new lover is unable to cope with the class difference between them and an accident leaves her paralysed. Drama, starring Lee Horsley, Lindsay Frost, Eva Marie Saint and Rod Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Matters of Life and Dating
programme.desc: A woman's confidence is destroyed following a mastectomy. When she attends a support group for cancer survivors, she is reunited with an old friend, who helps her to overcome her fears as she returns to the dating scene and tries to find the perfect man. Drama, starring Ricki Lake, Holly Robinson Peete, Rachael Harris, Dylan Neal and Gabriel Hogan.(n)

programme.title: Fighting the Odds: The Marilyn Gambrell Story
programme.desc: A parole officer sets up a programme in one of America's toughest schools to help the children of convicts to turn their lives around. Fact-based drama, starring Jami Gertz, Ernie Hudson and Eugene Clark.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben surprises his family when he returns home with a new wife, but soon finds married life is harder than expected.(n)

programme.title: Ironside
programme.sub-title: Downhill All the Way - Part Two
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Chief is put in danger when he hints that he has new evidence in a controversial case. Raymond Burr stars.(n)

programme.title: You Belong to Me
programme.desc: A woman suspects her ex-husband is stalking her, but realises too late that the culprit is actually an obsessive colleague, who ultimately kills himself after trying to murder her. She believes she and her son are safe at last - but strange events suggest he may not be as dead as he seems. Thriller, starring Shannon Elizabeth and Christian Campbell.(n)

programme.title: The Great Train Robbery
programme.desc: First of a two-part drama by Broadchurch writer Chris Chibnall telling the story of the most infamous heist in British history, beginning with the planning and execution of the crime from the perspective of the perpetrators themselves. After a robbery at Heathrow Airport in 1962, Bruce Reynolds sets his sights on another target - the plan being to rob the overnight mail train from Glasgow to Euston. A team is assembled, schemes are laid out and rehearsals begin. But despite their meticulous planning, the operation is compromised by an attack on the train driver and a botched getaway. Before long, the gang have become the most wanted men in Britain. Luke Evans, Paul Anderson, Martin Compston, Jack Roth and Neil Maskell star.(n)

programme.title: The Great Train Robbery
programme.desc: The police wake to the news of a robbery, but the full extent of the crime and its haul - £2.6million - only becomes evident over the following days. It's clear the local CID is ill-equipped to solve a case of such magnitude, so Scotland Yard is called in, with a six-strong team of detectives headed by the Flying Squad's enigmatic chief Tommy Butler. In a race against time, they set out to identify every criminal involved and bring them to justice before they flee the country - but even if they can, will they find the money? Jim Broadbent stars in the concluding part of the drama about the most infamous heist in British history, with George Costigan, Robert Glenister, Tim Pigott-Smith, Nick Moran and John Salthouse. Written by Broadchurch creator Chris Chibnall.(n)

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: A safecracker comes dangerously close to getting caught red-handed, so decides the time has come to quit his life of crime. However, an old friend soon tempts him back with the chance to steal a priceless French artefact being stored in a customs house, and he joins forces with a talented young thief to carry out one last heist. Crime thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Edward Norton, Marlon Brando and Angela Bassett.(n)

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: An activist is found murdered in her tenement flat, and the team's suspicions fall upon a local property developer whose plans to demolish the building were met with strong criticism by the campaigner. However, further investigations reveal a suspect closer to home. DI Ross annoys his superiors by focusing his attention on a hit-and-run case. Glasgow-set detective drama, starring John Michie.(n)

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: A battered wife with three children is persuaded by her sister to leave her abusive husband, but he continues to subject her to a barrage of harassment and threats - until the situation culminates in a fatal confrontation that changes the lives of all involved. Drama, starring Isabella Hofmann, Seth Adkins, Tracy Nelson and Matt Cooke.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The family offers the new minister a place to stay, and Elizabeth falls in love with him. Erin offers to help the Baldwin sisters write their memoirs.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben hatches a money-making scheme his father does not approve of, while Yancy trains to become a barber.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A new arrival in town encourages the farmers to invest in a new form of corn. However, when he has an accident and does not come home, they think they have been cheated.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A snowstorm strikes as the Ingalls make their way home after a trip to Mankato, and they struggle to survive in a remote mountain cabin with little food.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd meets an old medical school friend on leave from a rural African hospital, but he soon shows symptoms of the deadly Ebola virus, forcing the health department to clamp a quarantine around Syd's clinic and the Hansen household where a children's party is in full swing. Melina Kanakaredes stars.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: The Hansens have a surprise visit from an ageing member of the family, who has a potentially lucrative proposition.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Once in a Lifetime
programme.desc: An author reflects on her literary career while recovering from a road accident, but cannot help dwelling on the loss of her husband and baby - and further tragedy only serves to compound her sorrow. Drama, starring Lindsay Wagner, Barry Bostwick and Amy Aquino.

programme.title: The Edge of the Garden
programme.desc: A newly single man moves into an abandoned house in the country, where he starts to communicate with a woman who lived there 50 years ago and died in mysterious circumstances. Drama, starring Rob Estes.

programme.title: She Drives Me Crazy
programme.desc: A woman whose husband has recently died is invited on a road trip by her wilder estranged sister. The widow soon learns her younger sibling has a very important reason for taking this journey, which changes both their lives for ever. Drama, starring Krista Bridges and Melinda Clarke.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Emily thinks her lost love has come back to her, only to discover it is his son, who is more interested in Erin. Guest starring Jonathan Frakes (Star Trek: The Next Generation).

programme.title: Ironside
programme.sub-title: Downhill All the Way - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. A boy witnesses the murder of a political aide just before an election. Later, there is a leak inside the police department, and the Chief quits under the strain of protecting a witness. Raymond Burr stars.

programme.title: Voices
programme.desc: Following a near-death experience, a woman is terrified to realise she is able to see and speak with the dead. Returning home, she is approached by the angry ghost of a dead woman, who accuses her mysterious and handsome new neighbour of her own brutal murder. Drama, starring Amy Acker, Bronwen Booth and Steve Cumyn.

programme.desc: A bigoted misanthropic writer, who treats everyone he meets with contempt, is forced to look after a gay neighbour's dog, and develops an empathy with another creature for the first time in years. Romantic comedy drama, with Jack Nicholson, Helen Hunt, Cuba Gooding Jr and Greg Kinnear.

Crime thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Edward Norton, Marlon Brando and Angela Bassett.(n)

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas
programme.desc: Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood talent rep, loses his job because of his drinking. Despondent, he goes to Las Vegas to end his life in one final binge. But on the Strip, his plans are interrupted when he meets Sera, a street-smart hooker. Ben and Sera's chance meeting becomes a respite on the road to oblivion as these two disenfranchised souls form a bond that is as mysterious as it is immutable.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: A woman emerges from a coma four years after taking a bullet to the head at her own wedding, and goes on an epic vendetta against her former boss and his deadly squad of international assassins in a kill or be-killed fight. Directed by Quentin Tarantino; stars Uma Thurman and Lucy Liu.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: In this sequel to the Quentin Tarantino cult classic, a murderous bride continues her quest for vengeance against her former boss and lover and those who betrayed her, leading up to the ultimate confrontation with the man who ordered her execution. Stars Uma Thurman.

programme.title: Extreme Movie
programme.desc: A teenager suffering from the pain of lifelong virginity sets his sexual sights on his school's most popular girl in this raunchy sketch comedy featuring appearances from Michael Cera, Frankie Muniz and Beverly Mitchell.

programme.title: Kevin Smith: Silent But Deadly
programme.desc: Kevin Smith, the filmmaker, is anything but quiet in this new comedy special that was recorded an hour before his widely reported massive heart attack in February. But before he nearly died backstage, he killed onstage discussing his marriage, his kid, his friends and his work (or lack thereof).

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Follows the extraordinary life of college football hero Ernie Davis (Rob Brown), the first African-American to win the Heisman Trophy. His fight for equality forever changed the face of American sports. Based on a true story.

programme.title: The Debt
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Helen Mirren and Sam Worthington star in the story of Rachel Singer (Mirren), a former Mossad agent who endeavored to capture and bring to trial a notorious Nazi war criminal in a secret Israeli mission that ended with his death on the streets of East Berlin. Now, 30 years later, a man claiming to be the doctor has surfaced, and Rachel must go back to Eastern Europe to uncover the truth. Directed by Academy Award nominee John Madden.

programme.title: School Ties
programme.desc: In the 1950's, a talented quarterback (Brendan Fraser) from a working class Jewish family earns a scholarship to a prestigious New England prep school, but must keep his religious faith a secret from his blue blood classmates. Matt Damon and Amy Locane costar in this period drama.

programme.title: Get The Gringo
programme.desc: An already bad day for Driver is not getting any better. He makes a big haul of millions that would give him a nice summer vacation on easy street, but it goes south - literally. During a high-speed car chase with the US Border Patrol and a bleeding body in his back seat, Driver flips his car smashing through the border wall, tumbling violently, coming to a stop in Mexico. Apprehended by the Mexican authorities, he is sent to a hard-core prison where he enters the strange and dangerous world of "El Pueblito". Starring Mel Gibson.

programme.title: The Girl On The Train
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her recent divorce, spends her daily commute fantasizing about the seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes every day. One morning she sees something shocking happen there and becomes entangled in the mystery that unfolds. Emily Blunt, Lisa Kudrow, Justin Theroux and Allison Janney star.

Diagnosed with spinal cancer, 27 year old Adam (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) navigates the road to recovery with the sometimes-overbearing support of his crude best friend, Kyle (Seth Rogen), his smothering mother (Anjelica Huston) and an inexperienced therapist (Anna Kendrick). Inspired by a true story, 50/50 is an honest yet hysterically funny account of a young man's journey toward healing.

programme.title: Confessions of A Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: Lindsay Lohan stars as Lola, whose family moves from the center of everything in New York City to the center of a cultural wasteland in suburban New Jersey. She feels her life is simply not worth living, but no matter who or what gets in the way, Lola won't give up on her life's ambition to be a star.

programme.title: School Ties
programme.desc: In the 1950's, a talented quarterback (Brendan Fraser) from a working class Jewish family earns a scholarship to a prestigious New England prep school, but must keep his religious faith a secret from his blue blood classmates. Matt Damon and Amy Locane costar in this period drama.

programme.title: Captain Fantastic
programme.desc: Deep in the forests of the Pacific Northwest, isolated from society, a devoted father (Viggo Mortensen) dedicates his life to transforming his six young children into extraordinary adults. But when tragedy strikes the family, they are forced to leave this self-created paradise and begin a journey into the outside world that challenges his idea of what it means to be a parent and brings into question everything he's taught them.(n)

programme.title: Who Is America?: 107
programme.desc: Comedian Sacha Baron Cohen explores the diverse individuals, from the infamous to the unknown across the political and cultural spectrum, who populate our unique nation. Season finale.(n)

programme.title: Militarization
programme.desc: Our Cartoon President militarizes the government and launches a military parade with National Security Advisor John Bolton's help while Sean Hannity reshapes his cable news network in his aggressive image. Season finale.(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Stylish remake of the 1968 crime caper about a millionaire playboy thief, Thomas Crown (Pierce Brosnan), who steals priceless works of art for the sheer, adrenaline-fueled fun of it, and the sexy insurance investigator (Rene Russo) who's both attracted to her suspect and determined to nab him. Denis Leary costars in this classy, witty thriller.(n)

programme.desc: Deep in the forests of the Pacific Northwest, isolated from society, a devoted father (Viggo Mortensen) dedicates his life to transforming his six young children into extraordinary adults. But when tragedy strikes the family, they are forced to leave this self-created paradise and begin a journey into the outside world that challenges his idea of what it means to be a parent and brings into question everything he's taught them.(n)

programme.title: Chef
programme.desc: When Chef Carl Casper (Jon Favreau) suddenly quits his job at a prominent Los Angeles restaurant after refusing to compromise his creative integrity, he is left to figure out what's next. Finding himself in Miami, he teams up with his ex-wife (Sofia Vergara), his friend (John Leguizamo) and his son (Emjay Anthony) to launch a food truck. Taking to the road, Chef Carl goes back to his roots to reignite his passion for the kitchen for life.(n)

programme.title: Home Again
programme.desc: Reese Witherspoon stars as Alice Kinney who is recently separated from her husband. Alice decides to start over by moving back to her hometown of Los Angeles with her two young daughters. During a night out on her 40th birthday, Alice meets three aspiring filmmakers who happen to be in need of a place to live. Alice agrees to let the guys stay in her guest house temporarily, but the arrangement ends up unfolding in unexpected ways.(n)

programme.title: Gone
programme.desc: Amanda Seyfried ('Red Riding Hood') stars in this intense thriller about a desperate young woman who, after being ignored by the police, is forced to go on the hunt alone for a maniacal serial killer whom she believes has kidnapped her younger sister.(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: Ben Affleck takes over the role of hero CIA agent Jack Ryan in this box office hit based on the best-selling novel by Tom Clancy. Low-level analyst Ryan is elevated to prominence by his expertise on an obscure strongman (Ciaran Hinds) after the politician's surprising ascendancy to the Russian presidency. But that's just the tip of a very large, very lethal iceberg involving neo-Nazis and a nuclear warhead smuggled into the U.S. by terrorists. Morgan Freeman, Bridget Moynihan and Liev Schreiber costar in this espionage adventure.(n)

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: A lawyer becomes the target of a corrupt politician and his NSA operatives when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated murder. Starring Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight and Regina King.(n)

programme.title: Who Is America?: 101
programme.desc: Comedian Sacha Baron Cohen explores the diverse individuals, from the infamous to the unknown across the political and cultural spectrum, who populate our unique nation. Series premiere.(n)

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms.(n)

programme.title: Home Again
programme.desc: Reese Witherspoon stars as Alice Kinney who is recently separated from her husband. Alice decides to start over by moving back to her hometown of Los Angeles with her two young daughters. During a night out on her 40th birthday, Alice meets three aspiring filmmakers who happen to be in need of a place to live. Alice agrees to let the guys stay in her guest house temporarily, but the arrangement ends up unfolding in unexpected ways.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.(n)

programme.title: Who Is America?: 107
programme.desc: Comedian Sacha Baron Cohen explores the diverse individuals, from the infamous to the unknown across the political and cultural spectrum, who populate our unique nation. Season finale.(n)

programme.title: Militarization
programme.desc: Our Cartoon President militarizes the government and launches a military parade with National Security Advisor John Bolton's help while Sean Hannity reshapes his cable news network in his aggressive image. Season finale.(n)

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: A lawyer becomes the target of a corrupt politician and his NSA operatives when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated murder. Starring Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight and Regina King.(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: Ben Affleck takes over the role of hero CIA agent Jack Ryan in this box office hit based on the best-selling novel by Tom Clancy. Low-level analyst Ryan is elevated to prominence by his expertise on an obscure strongman (Ciaran Hinds) after the politician's surprising ascendancy to the Russian presidency. But that's just the tip of a very large, very lethal iceberg involving neo-Nazis and a nuclear warhead smuggled into the U.S. by terrorists. Morgan Freeman, Bridget Moynihan and Liev Schreiber costar in this espionage adventure.(n)

programme.title: Romy And Michele's High School Reunion
programme.desc: Romy (Mira Sorvino) and Michele (Lisa Kudrow) are carefree party girls who reinvent themselves for their 10-year high school reunion. With new wardrobes and wild stories of success, they make a big impression, until a former classmate (Janeane Garofalo) blabs their real story to everyone! But that's when Romy and Michele let loose with a surprise of their own to outrageous results.(n)

programme.title: Legally Blonde
programme.desc: Reese Witherspoon stars as Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen who rallies all her resources and follows her ex-boyfriend to Harvard law school, determined to win him back. But law school is a far cry from the comforts of her poolside and the mall. Elle must wage the battle of her life, for her guy, for herself and for all blondes.(n)

programme.title: Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: As we catch up with the Gallagher clan, Fiona is dividing her time between caring for the household and working at Worldwide Cup with her boss/boyfriend Mike Pratt. While her job and relationship are going smoothly, life at home is thrown into a state of upheaval with the reappearance of a drug-addled and deathly ill Frank. With Lip off at college and Ian still missing, Fiona attempts to connect with Debbie and Carl, who are dealing with the upheaval of their adolescent hormones (or lack thereof). Season premiere.(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Nudity, Mild Violence

programme.title: My Oldest Daughter
programme.desc: Fiona begins to enjoy the perks of living life just above the poverty line. She uses her newly activated health benefits to take the kids for checkups. However, when a road rage incident damages the company car, Fiona tells a much bigger lie about how it happened. Meanwhile, Lip seems to have lost his mojo as he struggles in school and with the ladies.(n)

programme.title: Like Father, Like Daughter
programme.desc: Frank stalks his previously unseen daughter, Sammi, and is surprised to find out she has a son, Chuck. Meanwhile, Fiona and Mike are getting serious. Also, Carl begins stealing dogs and holding them for ransom so that he can earn some drug money for Frank. Sheila has her first successful online date with Native American cowboy Roger Running Tree.(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Nudity, Mild Violence

programme.title: Strangers on a Train
programme.desc: Against her better judgment, Fiona continues her secret affair with Robbie. But the situation nearly boils over when Mike shows up at Robbie's apartment while Fiona's inside. Frank, in increasingly dire health straits due to liver disease, attempts to contrive an "accident" that will provide an ample insurance payout to cover the cost of a potential transplant.(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Nudity, Mild Violence

programme.title: There's the Rub
programme.desc: Fiona's series of bad decisions involving Robbie finally boil over. Frank and Sammi continue their pursuit of curing his liver trouble, while also catching up on the father-daughter time that Sammi has always craved. Lip gets a surprise visit at college from Army investigators.(n)

programme.title: Iron City
programme.desc: The aftermath of Liam's accident lands Fiona in county jail, unsure of Liam's condition or her future. The family, minus Frank, waits nervously for any update on Liam's status at the hospital. Meanwhile, after almost being killed by the sweat lodge, Frank wakes up in the emergency room and gets some sobering news about his declining health.(n)

programme.title: A Jailbird, Invalid, Martyr, Cutter, Retard, and Parasitic Twin
programme.desc: The Gallagher clan deals with some changing dynamics in the aftermath of Fiona's release from jail. With Fiona under court order to remain inside the house and Frank's illness keeping him out of commission, the weight of guardianship duties falls squarely on Lip's shoulders. Simultaneously struggling to keep up with responsibilities at school, he gets some unexpected assistance from Amanda, his roommate's girlfriend.(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Nudity, Mild Violence

programme.title: Hope Springs Paternal
programme.desc: Fiona prepares for a visit from her probation officer and must rid the house of all suspicious items, a mission that puts her directly at odds with Debbie and Carl. Meanwhile, Ian gets kicked out of Mickey's house by a hammer-wielding Svetlana, and finally makes his long-awaited return to the Gallagher house.(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Bonnie and Carl
programme.desc: In detention, Carl shares a connection with a troubled girl named Bonnie. Lip grows close to his roommate's now ex-girlfriend, while Debbie sets out to make life miserable for the new girl in Matty's life. Sheila returns from her trip to the reservation with big plans to adopt the Native American kids. Fiona experiences the struggles of job-hunting with a criminal record, while Mickey ignores the birth of his son to spend time with Ian, whose behavior is becoming increasingly erratic.(n)

credits.writer: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Nudity, Mild Violence

programme.title: Liver, I Hardly Know Her
programme.desc: Fiona goes off the rails, violating multiple terms of her probation by partying with Robbie's degenerate friends. When the family doesn't hear from her, it sends them into search-party mode - not too unlike their past experiences with Frank.(n)

programme.title: Emily
programme.desc: Fiona is hauled away to a correctional facility as Frank wakes up from his operation suffering from post-operative delirium. Meanwhile, Ian decides to crash Mickey's son's christening with an ultimatum. And when Amanda's parents bribe Lip to stay away from their daughter, Lip makes a decision that he hopes will help the family. Plus, Debbie meets an older student - who has a dark ulterior motive. Oh, and DCFS makes an unexpected visit.(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Nudity, Mild Violence

programme.title: Sleepwalkers
programme.desc: Tanya (Mädchen Amick) is a sexually curious virgin who falls for Charles (Brian Krause), the new boy in school, only to learn too late that he's a life-sucking sleepwalker. Charles and his mother, Mary (Alice Krige), are the last of a dying breed who are able to stay alive by feeding on the life force of young women. Able to mutate at will, they roam the Earth, forever fleeing discovery while searching for the next victim.

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: A scientist performs experiments involving intelligence enhancing drugs and virtual reality on a simple-minded gardener. The gardener is put on an extensive schedule of learning and quickly becomes brilliant. He has a few ideas of his own on how the research should continue and the scientist begins losing control of his experiment.

programme.title: The Scarehouse
programme.desc: Two years after a tragic accident, six girls are invited to a party inside an elaborate Halloween funhouse. Once inside, they realize the true purpose of the event: to torture them as part of a revenge scheme. Corey and Elaina have spent their entire time in jail planning the elaborate payback since being solely blamed for the accident two years prior. As the night goes on, they all realize there is more to the scandal and cover-up than previously thought.

programme.title: Shark Babes
programme.desc: A group of sexy marine biologists discover how sharks emit an erotic sound that no woman can resist. But will their research take them to new heights or simply turn them into shark babes bent on overthrowing mankind with sensuality?

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a lonely man who bumps into an old crush and subsequently becomes obsessed with her, leading him to hold her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works. But she is not who she seems to be - and his reason to lock her up may not be as crazy as originally thought.

programme.title: Sleepwalkers
programme.desc: Tanya (Mädchen Amick) is a sexually curious virgin who falls for Charles (Brian Krause), the new boy in school, only to learn too late that he's a life-sucking sleepwalker. Charles and his mother, Mary (Alice Krige), are the last of a dying breed who are able to stay alive by feeding on the life force of young women. Able to mutate at will, they roam the Earth, forever fleeing discovery while searching for the next victim.

programme.title: King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table
programme.desc: Facing defeat, Merlin banishes the evil enchantress Morgana and her son to the ends of universe. Vowing revenge, Morgana and her son return to Earth, hell-bent on destroying every last descendant of King Arthur and his Knights.

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first.

programme.title: Surviving The Wild
programme.desc: Following the untimely death of his grandpa Gus (Jon Voight), thirteen-year-old Shaun (Aidan Cullen) disregards his parent's wishes and embarks on a journey with his dog Riley, to spread his grandpa's ashes in the wild. Throughout the journey, Shaun is guided by the spirit of his grandfather. Together they overcome challenge after challenge, as Shaun traverses white water rapids and tries to evade two crazed hillbillies that are on his tail.

programme.title: At the Devil's Door
programme.desc: When ambitious young real estate agent Leigh is asked to sell a house with a checkered past, she crosses paths with a disturbed girl whom she learns is the runaway daughter of the couple selling the property. Leigh tries to intervene and help her, but becomes entangled with a supernatural force that pulls Leigh's sister Vera into its web, and has sinister plans for both of them. Starring Naya Rivera, Ashley Rickards and Catalina Sandino Moreno.

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare.

programme.title: Tekken 2: Kazuya's Revenge
programme.desc: While suffering from amnesia, Kazuya Mishima is kidnapped by an underground crime syndicate and forced to become a ruthless assassin. Awoken in the outskirts of Tekken city, Kazuya must traverse the unknown world to unravel the secrets and lies the city holds. Kazuya must solve the mysteries hidden behind his life.

programme.title: Willard
programme.desc: Willard Stiles (Bruce Davison) is a young man who lives alone with his mother. His boss is a vulgar, cruel man who is working Willard to death at his factory job. Lonely, depressed and isolated, Willard is on the verge of a breakdown when he makes a new friend: Ben, one of the many rats who live in his dilapidated home. Not only can Willard communicate with the rodent, but he can actually command him to do his bidding. Using Ben and his friends as instruments of retaliation, Willard commands his pets to carry out his vengeance.

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her.

programme.title: Would You Rather
programme.desc: After the tragic death of her parents, Iris (Brittany Snow) is desperate to make ends meet while caring for her terminally ill younger brother. Shepard Lambrick (Jeffrey Combs), a philanthropist who expresses interest in helping them, invites her to an exclusive dinner party. When she arrives, she finds herself among a group of similarly desperate individuals. They are all trapped in Lambrick's mansion and forced to play a sadistic game where only the winner will get out alive.

programme.title: Attack of the Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: When a scientific experiment unleashes an epidemic of zombies in the Alps, a trio of snowboarders find themselves in a battle for survival where they must use their snowboarding skills to defeat the aprés-ski undead once and for all.(n)

programme.title: Attack of the Killer Donuts
programme.desc: A chemical accident turns ordinary donuts into bloodthirsty monsters and three friends must track them down as they begin eating their victims. It's up to them to destroy the donuts and save their sleepy little town.(n)

programme.title: Zombie Honeymoon
programme.desc: When a beach-front encounter with a zombie during their honeymoon results in a groom with a taste for human flesh, a newlywed bride tries to make the best of a rapidly deteriorating situation in this romantic horror comedy starring Tracy Coogan and Graham Sibley.(n)

programme.title: B&B
programme.desc: Marc and Fred go to war when they are refused a double bed at a Christian B&B. They win their court case and go back. Triumph turns to terror when a Russian neo-Nazi checks in. Their weekend of fun becomes a bloody battle.(n)

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage.(n)

programme.title: Cursed to Kill
programme.desc: Rachel awakens in a hospital, paralyzed from the waist down after a failed attempt on her life for abandoning a cult suicide. Her suffering grows as the spirits of the deceased members begin to haunt her within the confines of the hospital room. They threaten to kill her unless she is willing to offer up a kindred soul in place of her own - her brother's child. But the week that Rachel is given to make her decision is tethered to a curse. All who have the misfortune of hearing anything she says are met with a swift and violent death.(n)

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse.(n)

programme.title: The Exorcism of Emily Rose
programme.desc: In an extremely rare decision, the Catholic Church officially recognized the demonic possession of Emily Rose, a 19-year-old Minnesota college freshman. An exorcism was performed and recorded, and that recording played a pivotal role in the events that followed. Told in terrifying flashbacks, this film chronicles the haunting trial of the priest accused of criminal negligence resulting in the death of the young girl believed to be possessed. Starring Laura Linney.(n)

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).(n)

programme.title: Don't Knock Twice
programme.desc: A successful sculptor named Jess returns to the UK to rebuild her relationship with Chloe, the daughter she was forced to give up nine years ago. When she agrees to come and live with her, Jess learns that Chloe has not come to stay because she wants to get to know her mother again. She has come because she is scared that a supernatural curse has claimed the life of her boyfriend, Danny, and is now coming for her. Chloe and Danny made the mistake of visiting an abandoned house once home to a witch, that comes for you if you knock on the door.(n)

programme.title: Lady Psycho Killer
programme.desc: A knife-wielding killer is on the loose in a small town slicing and dicing men of questionable intent. As her brutality leaves the town littered with corpses, her bloodlust is lost on her young lover who pursues her anyway.(n)

programme.title: Before I Fall
programme.desc: Sam (Zoey Deutch) seems to have everything a teenage girl could want: popularity, a hot boyfriend, cool status, fun friends, loving family and seeming happiness. But beyond the superficial, Sam's life isn't so charmed. She is one of a clique of high school mean girls who make life hell for those who are different. When Sam is killed in a car accident, she is forced to relive her last day on Earth seven times in order to get things right. She attempts to make sense of what befell her and gain a better understanding of herself and others.(n)

programme.title: 7 Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: A team of scientists made up of Jia (Li Bingbing), Ridley (Kellan Lutz), and Mason (Kelsey Grammer) are in search for a lost colleague in an ancient labyrinth. Before it's too late, the group must battle their way through a swarm of deadly, man-eating funnel web spiders and find out what is behind the arachnids' power and intelligence used to protect a secret powerful elixir.(n)

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.(n)

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).(n)

programme.title: The Exorcism of Emily Rose
programme.desc: In an extremely rare decision, the Catholic Church officially recognized the demonic possession of Emily Rose, a 19-year-old Minnesota college freshman. An exorcism was performed and recorded, and that recording played a pivotal role in the events that followed. Told in terrifying flashbacks, this film chronicles the haunting trial of the priest accused of criminal negligence resulting in the death of the young girl believed to be possessed. Starring Laura Linney.(n)

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Next Generation
programme.desc: A terrifying new version of the original horror hit from one of the first film's writers, this updated horror hit stars Matthew McConaughey and Renee Zellweger in the story of ill-fated teenagers whose prom night auto breakdown lands them squarely in the clutches of a demented rural family of serial killers.(n)

programme.title: Before I Fall
programme.desc: Sam (Zoey Deutch) seems to have everything a teenage girl could want: popularity, a hot boyfriend, cool status, fun friends, loving family and seeming happiness. But beyond the superficial, Sam's life isn't so charmed. She is one of a clique of high school mean girls who make life hell for those who are different. When Sam is killed in a car accident, she is forced to relive her last day on Earth seven times in order to get things right. She attempts to make sense of what befell her and gain a better understanding of herself and others.(n)

programme.title: The Preacher's Wife
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as an angel named Dudley sent to Earth to help a minister's marriage (Courtney B. Vance) to his wife (Whitney Houston). Things take a twist when Dudley accidentally falls in love with her.(n)

programme.title: Cold Souls
programme.desc: Paul Giamatti stars in this surreal comedy as an actor paralyzed by anxiety who decides to have his soul extracted by a high-tech company in order to alleviate his suffering but complications ensue when a mysterious soul-trafficking mule steals his soul and takes it to Russia.(n)

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town.(n)

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood becomes the focus of a long-running war between factions of werewolves in this gritty horror fantasy starring Jason Behr, Matthew Knight, Rhona Mitra and Elias Koteas.(n)

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.(n)

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out").(n)

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: In the 1860's, Hugh Crain finances the construction of Hill House, then dies an unexplained death. Tales circulate that the mansion is haunted by evil spirits. 130 years later, Dr. David Marrow (Liam Neeson), long fascinated by the Hill House legend, brings three people there for what he tells them will be a study in sleep disorders. They're outwardly brave, but it soon becomes evident that Hill House's sinister reputation has all of them on edge. Catherine Zeta-Jones, Lili Taylor and Owen Wilson costar.(n)

programme.title: ATM
programme.desc: After leaving a party together, coworkers David (Brian Geraghty), Emily (Alice Eve) and Corey (Josh Peck) stop at an ATM. Pulling into a desolate parking lot, Corey gets out to get cash and a routine transaction turns into a struggle for survival when an unknown man appears outside blocking their exit. With the wintry temperatures dipping below freezing, and the morning sunrise still hours away, they have no choice but to play the man's deadly game of cat-and-mouse.(n)

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.(n)

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood becomes the focus of a long-running war between factions of werewolves in this gritty horror fantasy starring Jason Behr, Matthew Knight, Rhona Mitra and Elias Koteas.(n)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

programme.title: Gods of Dangerous Financial Instruments
programme.desc: In the Season 1 premiere, Marty and The Pod travel to New York to consult for MetroCapital, a bank looking for a plan to unscrupulously justify their year-end bonuses as the financial world around them burns, but Marty makes an enemy of Greg Norbert, MetroCapital's number two executive. Back at home, Marty receives unwanted parenting advice from his live-in father Jeremiah when his son Roscoe decides to audition for the female lead in a school play.

programme.title: Amsterdam
programme.desc: Marty and The Pod are sent to Phoenix to clean up a mess at a very powerful sports franchise caused by the impending divorce of its high-powered owners. Jeannie takes a dinner meeting with Derek, an old flame, but is deflated when she finds out his real intentions toward her. On the home front, Marty continues his personal war with Principal Gita over Roscoe's cross-dressing.

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: Hot young stand-up comic Floyd Mooney is poised to jump to the next level of fame, if only he would stop sabotaging himself. But when a racially charged encounter between Floyd and a powerful film producer goes viral, Floyd finds an exciting new opportunity presenting itself - if he's willing to bend his principles to further his career. Series premiere.

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man
programme.desc: Elliot, his girlfriend Sasha, and their friend John move into an old house off campus for their last year in college. Almost immediately, Sasha begins to suspect there is something wrong with the home, and enlists her clairvoyant friend Kim to hold a séance. Prompted by a clue in the house, they attract the attention of The Bye Bye Man, an insidious supernatural figure who deceives and preys upon his victims before causing them to turn on those around them.

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
programme.desc: Coroner Tommy Tilden and son Austin run a morgue and crematorium in Virginia. When the local sheriff brings in a body found in the basement of a home, it seems like just another open-and-shut case. As the autopsy proceeds however, they are left reeling as the inspection brings new revelations. Perfectly preserved on the outside, Jane Doe seems to have been the victim of a horrific ritualistic torture. Tommy and Austin begin to piece together these gruesome discoveries, as an unnatural force takes hold of the crematorium.

programme.title: Starring Mr. Mike, Joseph McCarthy and Alfred Bernhard Nobel
programme.desc: Tragic news greets Thom as the agency tries to sell the Army on fear as a marketing strategy. Lee wants Julius to be a Jew. Thom wants to quit. Also: lobotomies, ISIS, and the meaning or not meaning of Life.(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Mild Violence

programme.title: Martin Lawrence Live: Runteldat
programme.desc: Comic actor Martin Lawrence ("Big Momma's House," "Black Knight") returns to his stand-up roots with this hilariously confessional concert that serves up stinging doses of social commentary and plenty of dishy revelations about his personal troubles. A tour-de-force comedy performance from a movie star who proves he's still got serious chops on a live stage.

programme.title: The 4th
programme.desc: Jamie is a down-on-his-luck illustrator who's behind on rent and tries to throw a cookout while his overbearing roommate is out of town on the 4th of July. He decides to borrow his roommate's bike for a quick trip to buy lighter fluid, but his entire day and life quickly go up in smoke. After an incident with a road-rager, Jamie finds himself far from home and trapped in a series of awkward and infuriating situations with strangers.

programme.title: Drunkboat
programme.desc: A young teenager, Abe (Jacob Zachar), manipulates the unsuspecting help of his alcoholic Uncle Mort (John Malkovich) to buy a boat from a con man named Mr. Fletcher (John Goodman).

programme.title: I'm Gonna Git You Sucka
programme.desc: After Junebug Spade dies of an overdose of gold chains, Jack Spade returns to avenge his brother's death. Discovering that the infamous Mr. Big has overtaken and overrun the ghetto with his evil ways, Jack reunites a group of onetime superheroes, John Slade, Flyguy, Hammer & Slammer and Kung Fu Joe, to overcome the powerful crime boss in a manhunt that will test their endurance.

programme.title: Eric Clapton: Life in 12 Bars
programme.desc: This documentary contextualizes Eric Clapton’s role in contemporary music and cultural history. Told through his own words, it reflects on his traumatic childhood, his difficult struggle with drugs and alcohol, the loss of his son and how he always found his inner strength and healing in music. It features extensive interviews with Clapton himself, along with his family, friends, musical collaborators, contemporaries and heroes – including late music icons B.B. King, Jimi Hendrix and George Harrison. Directed by Oscar winner Lili Fini Zanuck.

programme.title: This Isn't Funny
programme.desc: Eliot is a stand up comedian with crippling anxiety, while Jamie avoids life through partying and travel. When Jamie rides his bike into Eliot's car their exchange is not exactly pleasant. Eliot then riffs on their encounter in her set that night and Jamie is there to see it. Suddenly the chemistry is undeniable. Just as they open themselves up and see they might be a fit, new job opportunities and family crises strain their relationship.

programme.title: Unsportsmanlike Comedy with Rob Gronkowski
