programme.desc: Michelle Williams, Kristen Stewart and Laura Dern star as three women striving to forge their own paths amidst the wide-open plains of the American Northwest. The lawyer (Dern) finds herself contending with both office sexism and a hostage situation. The wife and mother (Williams) has determination to build her dream home which puts her at odds with the men in her life. The young law student (Stewart) forms an ambiguous bond with a lonely ranch hand (Lily Gladstone).(n)

programme.title: Romy And Michele's High School Reunion
programme.desc: Romy (Mira Sorvino) and Michele (Lisa Kudrow) are carefree party girls who reinvent themselves for their 10-year high school reunion. With new wardrobes and wild stories of success, they make a big impression, until a former classmate (Janeane Garofalo) blabs their real story to everyone! But that's when Romy and Michele let loose with a surprise of their own to outrageous results.(n)

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: In 1953, a time when women's roles are rigidly defined, novice art history professor Katherine Watson begins teaching at the prestigious all-female Wellesley College, which despite its academic reputation, is an environment where success is measured by how well the students marry. Encouraging these women to strive for a more enlightened future, Watson challenges the administration and inspires her students to look beyond the image of what is, and consider the possibilities of what could be.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Break
programme.desc: Peter Cattaneo ("The Full Monty") directs this British comedy starring James Nesbitt as Jimmy Hands, a raffish robber assigned to a grim correctional facility. When the prison's governor (Christopher Plummer) is persuaded to stage a production of a misguided musical based on the story of Admiral Nelson and Lady Emma Hamilton, Jimmy and his buddies seize the opportunity to plan a jailbreak. However, complicating matters is a lovely therapist (Olivia Williams), who, cast as Jimmy's costar, steals his heart. Timothy Spall and Lennie James costar.(n)

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms.(n)

programme.title: Motherhood
programme.desc: A Manhattan mother of two finds herself in the midst of an epic, soul-crushing struggle when she sets out on a seemingly simple mission: arrange her two-year-old child's birthday party. Uma Thurman, Minnie Driver and Anthony Edwards star in this comedy about a "day from Hell.".(n)

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: In 1953, a time when women's roles are rigidly defined, novice art history professor Katherine Watson begins teaching at the prestigious all-female Wellesley College, which despite its academic reputation, is an environment where success is measured by how well the students marry. Encouraging these women to strive for a more enlightened future, Watson challenges the administration and inspires her students to look beyond the image of what is, and consider the possibilities of what could be.(n)

programme.title: The Big Sleep
programme.desc: A private eye is hired by a wealthy general with two daughters, one dangerously wild, one sly and observant. As the events unfold, a blackmail and extortion case turns into a murder investigation, and the PI must figure out who is playing him and why.

programme.title: Key Largo
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Maxwell Anderson play about a war-weary World War II vet forced into a confrontation with the nervous, sadistic mobster who is holding the occupants of a Florida hotel hostage during a hurricane. Claire Trevor won a Supporting Actress Oscar as the gangster's drunken moll. (cc).

programme.title: The Gift of Love
programme.desc: A dying woman (Lauren Bacall) adopts an orphan girl so her husband (Robert Stack) won't be left alone. A remake of "Sentimental Journey." Hitty: Evelyn Rudie. Grant: Lorne Greene. (cc).

programme.title: Bright Leaf
programme.desc: After being driven from his spread by an autocratic tobacco tycoon, a tenant farmer returns in triumph with a revolutionary cigarette-making machine and sets about driving the mogul out of business.

programme.title: Confidential Agent
programme.desc: Graham Greene's excursion into man's loyalty, as a Spanish republican agent (Charles Boyer) meets fascist opposition in London. Lauren Bacall, Katina Paxinou, Peter Lorre, Wanda Hendrix, Victor Francen, George Coulouris, Dan Seymour. Fascinating. Photography by James Wong Howe.

programme.title: Le Notti Bianche
programme.desc: Luchino Visconti directed and cowrote this stylized and poignant updating of Dostoyevsky's novel about a strange but alluring young woman and the two men who love her.

programme.title: The Priest's Wife
programme.desc: Sophia Loren and Marcello Mastroianni star in this farce about a provincial woman who becomes infatuated with a clergyman. Maurizio: Venantino Venantini. Jimmy: Jacques Stany. Billi: Pippo Starnazza. Monsignor Caldana: Augusto Mastrantoni. Davide: Giuseppe Maffioli. Signora Billi: Miranda Campa. Directed by Dino Risi.

programme.title: Ginger and Fred
programme.desc: A dance act that split up years before reunite in order to take advantage of a lucrative offer from television producers to perform again. However, age and old feelings complicate the plan.

programme.title: A Slightly Pregnant Man
programme.desc: Satire about a husband (Marcello Mastroianni) with child. Catherine Deneuve, Micheline Presle, Marisa Pavan. Simon: Claude Melki.

programme.title: Family Diary
programme.desc: A series of flashbacks detail the story of two brothers, separated as youngsters, and the different paths they undertake until finally being reunited years later as one is dying.

programme.title: Marriage Italian Style
programme.desc: Blend of social comedy and tears. Acted with skill by Sophia Loren and Marcello Mastroianni. Alfredo: Aldo Puglisi. Rosalie: Tecla Scarano. Diane: Marilu Tolo. Brilliantly directed by Vittorio de Sica.

programme.title: La Notte
programme.desc: Michelangelo Antonioni's portrait of a dying marriage, with Marcello Mastroianni as an unhappy novelist and Jeanne Moreau as his restless wife. Valentine: Monica Vitti. Tommaso: Bernhard Wicki.

Fellini's Oscar-winning portrait of a film director struggling with a creative crisis. After admitting he's stumped for ideas about the film he's shooting, he holes away at a spa and retreats into reveries about his childhood and personal fantasies, much to the frustration of his impatient film crew and the exasperated women in his life.(n)

programme.title: A Special Day
programme.desc: The film is set during the late 1930s; the occasion is the first meeting between Mussolini and Hitler. Left alone in her tenement home when her fascist husband runs off to attend the historic event, Sophia Loren strikes up a friendship with her homosexual neighbor Mastroianni. As the day segues into night, they develop a very special relationship that will radically alter both of their outlooks on life.(n)

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Apalled by 19th-century conditions in a textile mill, a political refugee visiting Turin, Italy, organizes workers to strike. Based on actual events.(n)

programme.title: The Pizza Triangle
programme.desc: A three-way love affair develops between a construction worker, his fiancée and a pizzeria cook.(n)

programme.title: A Place for Lovers
programme.desc: Marcello Mastroianni and Faye Dunaway in this drama about an Italian engineer involved with an American divorcée. Filmed in Northern Italy. Maggie: Caroline Mortimer. Griselda: Karin Engh. Directed by Vittorio de Sica.(n)

programme.title: Spring Fever
programme.desc: Silent comedy-romance about a shipping clerk who joins a country club, woos an heiress and gets involved in a high-stakes golf match.(n)

programme.title: Across to Singapore
programme.desc: Two seafaring brothers compete for the attentions of a neighbor's daughter.(n)

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: W. Somerset Maugham's tale of Sadie Thompson, a South Seas floozy who falls prey to a hell-and-brimstone reformer wishing to save the soul of the "lost woman," while being romanced by a lovelorn U.S. soldier.(n)

programme.title: The Last of Mrs. Cheyney
programme.desc: A pair of debonair jewel thieves prey on British aristocrats while attending a high-society party.(n)

programme.title: Mannequin
programme.desc: The story of a young tenement woman and the men she marries: a fight manager and a tugboat-line operator.(n)

programme.title: When Ladies Meet
programme.desc: A young man loves an author who is about to have an affair with her publisher, despite having met his wife, whom she has come to like and admire.(n)

programme.title: Humoresque
programme.desc: A blue-collar violinist accepts the patronage of a wealthy woman in order to further his career.(n)

programme.title: Torch Song
programme.desc: A jaded Broadway diva must overcome her deep cynicism and fear in order to obtain true love with the blinded soldier who truly adores her.(n)

programme.title: Sudden Fear
programme.desc: A playwright (Joan Crawford) discovers her husband (Jack Palance) and his girlfriend (Gloria Grahame) are planning her death. Bruce Bennett, Virginia Huston, Touch (Michael) Connors. Expert suspense melodrama directed by David Miller.(n)

programme.title: Harriet Craig
programme.desc: A successful man marries a woman without realizing that she is neurotic, manipulative and selfish, and who treasures his house and possessions above him.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye, My Fancy
programme.desc: A Congresswoman, who was expelled from college for having an affair with a professor, returns to her alma mater to receive an honorary degree.(n)

programme.title: Strait-Jacket
programme.desc: Ax murders occur during a reunion between a disturbed woman (Joan Crawford) and her daughter (Diane Baker). Bill: Leif Erickson. Raymond: Howard St. John. Michael: John Anthony Hayes. Emily: Rochelle Hudson. Robert Bloch script.(n)

programme.title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
programme.desc: An embittered has-been child actor torments her disabled sister, while scheming to resurrect her own vaudeville career when she was known as the talented "Baby Jane.(n)

programme.title: Treasure Island
programme.desc: The first sound version of Robert Louis Stevenson's oft-filmed classic tale of a young English lad, a one-legged pirate named Long John Silver and a quest for buried treasure. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Dumb-Hounded
programme.desc: A police dog named Droopy pursues a wolf who escaped from prison.(n)

programme.title: Sacred City of the Mayan Indians
programme.desc: Entry in the "Traveltalk" series visits a Guatemalan city where the Maya civilization once flourished. Narrated by James A. Fitzpatrick.(n)

programme.title: The Fargo Kid
programme.desc: A cowboy mistaken for a notorious gunman takes advantage of the misunderstandingto intimidate criminals who've overrun a mining town. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Popeye Pleased to Meet Cha!
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto, rivals for Olive Oyl's affection, call on her bearing gifts.(n)

programme.title: Tarzan and the Trappers
programme.desc: When not busy rescuing his animal friends, Tarzan (Gordon Scott) attempts to prevent the looting of a lost city. Eve Brent, Ricki Sorenson, Lesley Bradley, Maurice Marsac. Charles Haas, Sandy Howard directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Pony Express Days
programme.desc: After being deemed too heavy, a young Bill Cody (George Reeves) is turned down as a Pony Express rider, but when a deliveryman is gunned down, Cody takes a shot at running the route. David Bruce, Frank Wilcox. Directed by B. Reeves Eason.(n)

programme.title: Double Indemnity
programme.desc: An insurance salesman is seduced by a conniving woman into a scheme to murder her husband and make it look like an accident in order to collect his impressive life insurance policy. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Them!
programme.desc: Atomic-bomb testing spawns an army of giant mutant ants that march through the storm drains of Los Angeles. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Time Machine
programme.desc: In 1899, a young scientist completes the construction of his time-travel machine and thrusts himself into the 20th century, witnessing the wars that took place before launching himself ahead to a distant year where humankind is not at all like it was. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Operation Crossbow
programme.desc: Secret agents of the Allied forces take on a mission to go behind enemy lines and covertly destroy a German missile base. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: A teen finds himself at the center of a battle to save Earth from transforming alien robots. (cc).

programme.title: Tower Heist
programme.desc: NYC condo manager Josh Kovacs (Ben Stiller) and his staff plot to rob the penthouse of a thieving Wall Street billionaire who defrauded them out of their savings. But they'll need the help of a crafty thief (Eddie Murphy) to execute the heist. (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A radio-show host is killed and suspicion falls on his attractive widow (Paula Devicq), who's set to inherit $20 million, and two of the woman's lovers. Will Shea: Joseph Cross. Karen Nix: Dana Eskelson. Laurie: Jacqueline Kristel. Susan: Erin Cherry. Borgia: Annie Parisse. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A basketball star (Poncho Hodges) becomes a suspect in the killing of a loner who had filed a lawsuit after being injured at a game. Leon Chiles: Joe Morton. Fontana: Dennis Farina. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A driver killed in a car crash is linked to the murders of a hunting party in upstate New York and then to an eyewitness to the fatalities. Stoller: Mike Pniewski. Selma Flanagan: Julia Gibson. Tommy Flanagan: Jake M. Smith. Borgia: Annie Parisse. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The death of a college student found strangled in her dorm room leads to a case involving strip clubs and insider trading. James Harris: Peter Van Wagner. Andy Polone: Stephen Spinella. Julius Reinhard: Mark Nelson. Lawrence Weaver: Bob Dishy. Jay Hurley: Ryan Hornchick. Brad Hurley: Michael Weaver. Wendy Alston: Adrienne Shelly. McCoy: Sam Waterston. Briscoe: Jerry Orbach. Green: Jesse L. Martin. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives' investigation into why a wealthy woman is comatose involves her husband (David Dukes), daughter (Marin Hinkle) and doctor (John Slattery). Eric Berner: Lee Wilkof. Linda Walsh: Caitlin Clarke. Rob Streim: Christopher Wells. Briscoe: Jerry Orbach. Green: Jesse L. Martin. McCoy: Sam Waterston. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After the death of a man who tried to find who was responsible for the torture-killing of his son in Chile many years ago, McCoy goes after a colonel (Tomas Milian) who's now in a Manhattan hospital. programme.desc: Milos Forman ("One Flew over the Cuckoo's Nest") directed this biography about the zany life and times of actor-comedian Andy Kaufman. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, ten strangers are stranded at an isolated motel in the Nevada desert, only to learn each of them has a secret, and that their arrival at the motel has not been a matter of mere chance. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Nine to Five
programme.desc: Three female office workers become friends and get revenge against their boss, a sexist egotistical lying hypocritical bigot, and in so doing create a more efficient and pleasant work environment. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.desc: Jemaine and Murray wonder if Bret's girlfriend is trying to split up the band when Bret begins spending more time with her. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Yes Man
programme.desc: A perennial naysayer becomes a guy who just can't say "no" (and won't) after attending a self-help seminar that challenges him to say yes to everything for a year. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Sylvia
programme.desc: Alternately brooding and impassioned biopic focusing on the troubled seven-year marriage of poets Sylvia Plath (Gwyneth Paltrow) and Ted Hughes (Daniel Craig). Paltrow brings a subtle, textured air to the role. Her real-life mother, Blythe Danner, plays her screen mom. Christine Jeffs directed. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: 5 Flights Up
programme.desc: When an elderly couple discover that their Brooklyn apartment has increased in value, they decide to sell and move to Manhattan. However, they soon learn that relocating won't be easy. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
programme.desc: Frustrated with the lack of progress by the local police in finding those responsible for the brutal murder of her daughter, a mother installs three controversial billboards on the edge of town to goad the department into action. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: A British screenwriter (Ewan McGregor) agrees to ghostwrite the memoirs of a retired prime minister, but after he takes the job the former political leader is accused of committing a war crime. As the writer uncovers facts that corroborate these suspicions, he begins to fear he might be killed, just like the man who worked on the memoirs before him. Directed by Roman Polanski. Pierce Brosnan, Tom Wilkinson, Olivia Williams. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: In the third installment of the "Planet of the Apes" prequel series, simian leader Caesar seeks revenge on the humans who killed his family. In time, his vendetta threatens to ignite all-out war between the two species. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: Tim wants to snag a big promotion at work, but to do so he must take an eccentric nutcase to his boss's dinner party, where guests are supposed to bring the strangest person they can find. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
programme.desc: Frustrated with the lack of progress by the local police in finding those responsible for the brutal murder of her daughter, a mother installs three controversial billboards on the edge of town to goad the department into action. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: The Coen brothers' sly drama about a policewoman (Frances McDormand) who's trying to determine how several murders and a kidnapping are linked to an unassuming car salesman (William H. Macy). Showalter: Steve Buscemi. Grimsrud: Peter Stormare. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Laurel Canyon
programme.desc: A hard-partying rock-and-roll record producer opens her posh California digs to her stuffy son and his equally stuffy fiancée. The character study was written and directed by Lisa Cholodenko, who was partially inspired to make the film while listening to Joni Mitchell's landmark "Ladies of the Canyon" album. Actor Alessandro Nivola, who plays Ian, lead singer of an English rock band, does his own vocals. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: From Hell
programme.desc: Johnny Depp plays an opium-addicted inspector who uses his clairvoyant powers to try to track down Jack the Ripper in 19th-century London. Heather Graham, Ian Holm, Ian Richardson, Robbie Coltrane, Lesley Sharp. Directed by Albert and Allen Hughes. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Adam
programme.desc: This character study stars Hugh Dancy as Adam, a man living with Asperger's syndrome, who does his best to reach out to his pretty new upstairs neighbor. As Adam attempts to gain control of his social skills, he discovers that with a little patience and understanding, developing a meaningful relationship might not be as hard as he previously thought. Peter Gallagher, Amy Irving, Rose Byrne. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: Jim Carrey's comic timing is impressive in this comedy about a slick, overachieving lawyer who's forced to tell the truth, the whole truth and nothing but the truth. Jennifer Tilly. Audrey: Maura Tierney. Dana: Swoosie Kurtz. Miranda: Amanda Donohoe. Directed by Tom Shadyac. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Latin Explosion A New America
programme.desc: John Leguizamo narrates a look at the growing influence of Latino culture and music in the U.S. from the 1950s to the 21st century that features footage of vintage performances and remarks by artists and entertainers, including Marc Anthony, Gloria Estefan, José Feliciano, Eva Longoria, Jennifer Lopez, Ricky Martin, Rita Moreno, Pitbull, Shakira and Sofía Vergara. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Amelia
programme.desc: This biopic spans the life of aviator extraordinaire Amelia Earhart (Hilary Swank), whose famous voyage across the Atlantic was tragically overshadowed by her mysterious disappearance five years later. Richard Gere, Ewan McGregor. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Under the Tuscan Sun
programme.desc: A bitter, divorced writer finds solace and romance after she impulsively buys and renovates a villa in Tuscany. Screenplay adapted from the memoir by Frances Mayes. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore makes her directorial debut with this quirky sports drama about an ex-beauty queen (Ellen Page) who gives up her tiara for roller derby, to the dismay of her mother (Marcia Gay Harden). Kristen Wiig, Juliette Lewis. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Victoria and Abdul
programme.desc: Queen Victoria forges an unlikely bond with an Indian clerk who traveled to London for her Golden Jubilee. The pair eventually become lifelong friends, although the Queen's inner circle are horrified by their relationship. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: A newsmagazine that investigates global current events, including political and cultural topics. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Silence of the Lambs
programme.desc: Best Picture winner about an FBI trainee (Best Actress Jodie Foster), who has a knack for analyzing serial killers, and enlists the aid of an imprisoned, cannibalistic sociopath (Best Actor Anthony Hopkins) in tracking a sadistic murderer. programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: A reporter investigates a possible link between the CIA and the importing of cocaine into the U.S. in the 1980s. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.desc: A woman on the run regrets checking in at the Bates Motel, a lodge operated by a strange man with an unhealthy fixation on his mother. Remake of the Hitchcock classic. (cc).

programme.desc: A young drug dealer struggles with the moral implications of his work. (cc).

programme.title: You Got Served

programme.title: The Zookeeper's Wife
programme.desc: A husband and wife in Nazi-occupied Poland use their positions as caretakers at the Warsaw Zoo to shepherd Jews out of the country. Based on a true story. (cc).

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: When CIA agents Oakes and Pope try to secure a suitcase-sized nuke from a black-market dealer, they are ambushed and Pope is killed. Desperate for the bad guys to believe that Pope is still alive, Oakes recruits Pope's long-lost twin, a petty criminal. (cc).

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: An 11-year-old boy, who has witnessed a suicide, hires an attorney to protect himself and his family from mobsters. (cc).

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: While still on the lam, amnesiac Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone wrong. Bourne is then cornered into using his accomplished assassin techniques to fight for survival and clear his name. (cc).

programme.title: Collateral

programme.title: Unforgettable

programme.title: Arachnophobia
programme.desc: A doctor in a small town discovers that a spate of recent deaths are due to lethal spiders that have spawned after being accidentally shipped there from South America. He fights the deadly creatures with the help of an outrageous exterminator. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Thaw

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Kyle, family and friends mourn following a disaster, until a revelation from Rev. Anderson compels them to use Amber's special powers. Meanwhile, Allison rejoins her family in Rome. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven

programme.title: Secret Window
programme.desc: Suffering from writer's block, an unstable author is accused of plagiarism. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Bachelor Party
programme.desc: Rowdy friends throw a bachelor party for a groom-to-be, whose future bride infiltrates the bash to test his fidelity. Meanwhile, her rich daddy does his best to stop the wedding. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Taking Woodstock
programme.desc: Demetri Martin stars in this historical comedy-drama about the celebrated 1969 festival of peace and love. Martin plays Elliot Teichberg, an interior designer who offers to help out the promoters of Woodstock when they lose their permit to have the concert. He provides a space for the show, but must think on his feet when the entire event becomes much larger than he imagined. Directed by Ang Lee. Eugene Levy, Emile Hirsch, Liev Schreiber. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Oscar winner Julia Roberts as a sassy, low-level law-office worker who becomes obsessed with a case involving a California utility company that's accused of polluting the drinking water in a small town. The real-life Erin Brockovich has a cameo as a waitress named Julia. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Going in Style
programme.desc: Three elderly friends and retired steelworkers are outraged to learn that their pension fund has been raided by a shady corporation. In response, they decide to rob one of the corporation's banks to get their hard-earned money back. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Jackal
programme.desc: A Russian gangster hires a mysterious, high-tech assassin (Bruce Willis) to kill a high-profile American citizen. Formulaic. Loosely based on the far superior 1973 film "The Day of the Jackal." Richard Gere, Sidney Poitier. Michael Caton-Jones directed. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
programme.desc: A successful hit man reevaluates his profession while attending his high-school reunion. (cc).(n)

programme.desc: The feisty video-game heroine goes against an evil scientist who specializes in biological weapons as they both race to find Pandora's Box. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.

programme.title: Dzień dobry
programme.desc: Poranne pasmo muzyczne, w którym prezentowane są najlepsze teledyski artystów cieszących się dużą popularnością.

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Patrick suddenly becomes a genius after receiving a nasty blow to the head, but his high IQ makes him no longer interested in fun things. (repeat).

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.sub-title: Driven to Tears; Rule of Dumb
programme.desc: Patrick passes his driving test and wins a car, much to the chagrin of SpongeBob, who has failed three times in a row. Later, news that Patrick is next in line to be made a king goes to the starfish's head. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey's new agent gets him a cheeky role in a movie; Chandler dates a woman with lots of baggage. Aurora: Sofia Milos. Joey: Matt LeBlanc. Monica: Courteney Cox. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: A blackout traps Chandler in an ATM vestibule with model Jill Goodacre; a cat comes between Ross and Rachel. Paolo: Cosimo Fusco. Mr. Heckles: Larry Hankin. Chandler: Matthew Perry. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Nana Dies Twice
programme.desc: Monica and Ross mourn the loss of their grandmother. Judy: Christina Pickles. Jack: Elliott Gould. Aunt Lillian: Elinor Donahue. Ross: David Schwimmer. Monica: Courteney Cox. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler's novelist mother (Morgan Fairchild) visits---and hits on Ross; Phoebe and Monica fall for the same guy. Paolo: Cosimo Fusco. Chandler: Matthew Perry. Monica: Courteney Cox. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Dozen Lasagnas
programme.desc: Phoebe has some bad news for Rachel about Paolo; Ross learns some of the results of his former wife's amniocentesis. Paolo: Cosimo Fusco. Carol: Jane Sibbett. Susan: Jessica Hecht. Ross: David Schwimmer. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler sees Rachel naked; Joey learns his father is having an affair; Phoebe dates a psychiatrist. Gloria: Brenda Vaccaro. Roger: Fisher Stevens. Joey Sr.: Robert Costanzo. Ronni: Lee Garlington. (repeat).

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Conflicting stories about Violet and Gregory's breakup emerge, and Christy and Bonnie don't know who to believe. Linda Lavin guest stars. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Hard reality upends Christy's dream of becoming a lawyer when she realizes how much the education will cost. Meanwhile, Bonnie takes on the role of disciplinarian with Violet back in the home. The Season 3 finale. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Adam moves in with Bonnie, which sorely tests their relationship. Meanwhile, Christy joins forces with Jill to meet men. The Season 4 premiere. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Mom
programme.sub-title: Sword Fights and a Dominican Shortstop
programme.desc: Christy must contemplate giving up her dream job as a lawyer when Bonnie's former girlfriend (Rosie O'Donnell) offers her big-bucks employment in real estate. Also, Adam grows curious about Bonnie's past with women. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: George goes behind his bosses' backs to their retired partner/brother to try to get a better dental plan. Dr. Holland: Michael Clarke Duncan. Lou: Paul Gleason. Jack: Jack Blessing. Mel: Mark Tymchyshyn. Max: Luis Armand Garcia. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: George has another encounter with his sister, who wants to meet the mother who gave her up for adoption. Linda: Eva La Rue. Benny: Belita Moreno. Max: Luis Armand Garcia. Angie: Constance Marie. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: After an earthquake, Carmen and George are afraid to reenter the house, so they set up camp in the backyard. Inspector: Ron Pearson. Benny: Belita Moreno. Carmen: Masiela Lusha. Vic: Emiliano Diez. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.sub-title: George Takes a Stroll down Memory Pain
programme.desc: Flashbacks show how newlyweds George and Angie lived with Benny, until an incident George hasn't known the entire truth about, until now. Benny: Belita Moreno. Angie: Constance Marie. Ernie: Valente Rodriguez. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam tells a wild story to the kids at school to explain his broken arm, but his lie ends up threatening his friendship with Emmy Mirsky. Meanwhile, Beverly worries that her family won't eat at home again after a new Chinese restaurant captures their hearts and appetites. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly gets Mr. Meller fired for singling out Adam during dodgeball, but after some persuading from Adam and Murray she ends up fighting for him to be rehired. Meanwhile, Barry is unable to deal with the fact that Erica is better than him at a new board game called Trivial Pursuit. (repeat) (cc).

programme.sub-title: Bubble Trouble; The Way of the Sponge

programme.sub-title: Wet Painters; Krusty Krab Training Video

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.sub-title: The Children's Fete; Fruit; The Aquarium; The Fish Pond; Pedro Is Late
